channel.title: Camelot teleporter [scar]
channel.description:
ok here we go ron thanks for the no bug one
[scar]{=================================================] Name: Auto Camelot Teleporter Author: zsakul2 Version: 1.1 on July 30th, 2006 This script is a little undetectable, but if for any reason you get banned. Remember, I am not resposible. Editted and made less detectable by Ron.[=================================================} Program CamelotTeleporter; // Constants...Const // I suggest you change this every so often. Msg = '(god this is taking forever)'; // How many times do you want to teleport? Tele = 500; // Variables...Var // Sets these to integers. TotalTeles, x, y : Integer; // Taken from The RS Monkey's tutorial.Procedure SendKeysHuman(text:String);Var a1 : Integer;Begin a1:= 1; Repeat wait(random(220) + 15); sendkeys(copy(text, a1, 1)); a1:= a1 + 1; Until a1 > length(text);End; Begin // Activates the client you put the target on. ActivateClient; // Repeats this until... Repeat // Random wait. Wait(2000+Random(2000)); // If a Random of 10 is equal to 1, then Send the Message. If(Random(10) = 1)Then Begin // Send human like keystrokes of the Msg you entered. SendKeysHuman(Msg); End; // Smoothly moved the mouse to the correct spot. // Doesn't always click on the same spot. MoveMouseSmoothEx(610+Random(5), 295+Random(5), 5, 5, 5, 5, 5); // Random wait. Wait(4000 + Random(1000)); // Gets the Mouse Position GetMousePos(x, y); // Clicks on that spot. ClickMouse(x, y, True); // Adds one to TotalTeles. TotalTeles := TotalTeles + 1; // Until Alchs equal TotalTeles. Until(Tele = TotalTeles) // Send a congratulatory message in the Debug Box. WriteLn('Thank you for using my Camelot Auto Teleporter.');End.[/scar]
[scar]dunno why scar script is doing that[/scar]

item.title: Camelot teleporter [scar]
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

I made your script better.

Edit: I just forgot to use SCAR Tags.
[scar]
{=================================================]
Name: Auto Camelot Teleporter
Author: zsakul2
Version: 1.1 on July 30th, 2006

This script is a little undetectable, but if for
any reason you get banned. Remember, I am not
resposible.

Editted and made less detectable by Ron.
[=================================================}

Program CamelotTeleporter;

// Constants…
Const
// I suggest you change this every so often.
Msg = ‘(god this is taking forever)’;
// How many times do you want to teleport?
Tele = 500;

// Variables…
Var
// Sets these to integers.
TotalTeles, x, y : Integer;

// Taken from The RS Monkey’s tutorial.
Procedure SendKeysHuman(text:String);
Var
a1 : Integer;
Begin
a1:= 1;
Repeat
wait(random(220) + 15);
sendkeys(copy(text, a1, 1));
a1:= a1 + 1;
Until a1 > length(text);
End;

Begin
// Activates the client you put the target on.
ActivateClient;
// Repeats this until…
Repeat
// Random wait.
Wait(2000+Random(2000));
// If a Random of 10 is equal to 1, then Send the Message.
If(Random(10) = 1)Then
Begin
// Send human like keystrokes of the Msg you entered.
SendKeysHuman(Msg);
End;
// Smoothly moved the mouse to the correct spot.
// Doesn’t always click on the same spot.
MoveMouseSmoothEx(610+Random(5), 295+Random(5), 5, 5, 5, 5, 5);
// Random wait.
Wait(4000 + Random(1000));
// Gets the Mouse Position
GetMousePos(x, y);
// Clicks on that spot.
ClickMouse(x, y, True);
// Adds one to TotalTeles.
TotalTeles := TotalTeles + 1;
// Until Alchs equal TotalTeles.
Until(Tele = TotalTeles)
// Send a congratulatory message in the Debug Box.
WriteLn(‘Thank you for using my Camelot Auto Teleporter.’);
End.
[/scar]

  • WriteLn will not type stuff for you. It will only write to the Debug Box. You can use SendKeys to send messages.
  • Use the Random function and put it in the MoveMouse function.
  • Make sure to format the code by using proper standards.
  • And well, you can look at the script and what I have changed.

My version of your script is much less detectable, I hope you learn from it.
I commented every part, so you should be able to learn or get something out of it. Have fun!

~Ron

Read full topic

item.title: Camelot teleporter [scar]
item.dc:creator: @Fishygame Fishygame
item.description:
@Fishygame wrote:

This would get you banned very easily as it just clicks the exact same spot.
Plus it uses MoveMouse instead of MoveMouseSmooth.

It’s a good start but you should try studying other people’s scripts and learn from them.

Read full topic
